comments: This game is really fun, I love everything about it, specially joining in a clan. But I wish there would be a chance to chat with each member not just smileys but as of now it's super great! Really fun to play, this is the longest time I've ever played such a game in my phone. Absolutely love it!

this game is good till about 8 hours in where your waiting days to build anything. Gems are really hard to come by so you have to be wary about how much stock u have. And there's no way to dispose of unwanted items in your warehouse (that I know of) but yeah, it's a catchy game

Pretty much a money pit. It's designed to frustrate you into spending money. Everything takes stupid amounts of resources to build or expand. The expansions are tiny. It becomes impossible to fill orders because they all want items you can't make because you cant build anything. Caravans usually ask for ridiculous amount of things and you have no storage room. Everything takes too long to make or regrow so even if you have room, the caravan times out. And the rewards for filling them is measly. It'll still take weeks to get enough to defeat monsters that block expansions. Don't download if youre looking for a fun game.

I liked this game, and have played it for months, until a few days ago when I noticed the "price" of buildings required to progress take a huge jump up!! I will gladly support a game I like by making purchases but I'm not about to spend my house payment just to progress IN A GAME!! Not cool, and makes me regret the money Ive spent so far. On to the next!!

Question why do I have to give 30 diamonds for one shield? And Everytime I expand my barn it on expand from 5-10 I need more room then that over then that.. I wake up out my sleep just to play this game. I need more space please and Thank u.
They deleted my whole account out of nowhere!  Everything gone. Don't waste your time. And please dont spend any money. Totally rip off!

comments: Hi! I have been playing bloons td ever since the 1st one came out and I'm still playing btd5 today. I can't wait for btd6 and btd adventure later this year! Also. One suggestion, I feel like a lot of long time players including myself would be much more likely to participate in the random events on maps if they were also doable on mastery mode. Thank You! I look forward to more big things from Ninja Kiwi!

Works good on my Sony Xperia XZs. Only problem is if I'm doing an impoppable track and I'm using Monkey Engineers. On those few levels where a mass of regeneration bloons come in, the game lags like hell. My workaround for that has been to be lame and just get sun gods

Bloons TDs have always been a favorite of mine. But I'm only giving 3 stars because of a technical issue that's mind boggling. I'm on a galaxy note 8, and I start to experience game halting slowdown on level 79. I had played this game on my note 4, and could easily double that before the hardware struggled. Please please fix it

I love this game. It works great on my phone.  My only problem is that I had to reinstall it and I don't know how to get everything back. If you could help that would be great. Also to be totally honest, I'm pretty sure I didn't save it to the cloud or my Facebook account.

Extemely good game for pretty much any age or level of play. Easy to get into and there's enough depth of game that it will take a lot of playing to get bored. Also works well on any platform - I have it on my ipad and Samsung phone. :)

I love this game only problem is I broke my phone and had to get a new one. Trying to figure out how to get everything back. I have purchased alot of things. $31000 and now only have $100. Logged in with my Facebook account still nothing. Help!!!! Please so I can get back to enjoying this game!
description: Five-star tower defense with unrivaled depth and replayability.Build awesome towers, choose your favorite upgrades, hire cool Special Agents, and pop every last invading Bloon in the best ever version of the most popular tower defense series in history.Bloons TD 5 delivers hours of fun and challenging play to fans and new players alike, with awesome features like this:- 21 powerful towers with Activated Abilities and 2 upgrade paths- 50+ Tracks- Two-player co-operative play on custom co-op tracks- 10 Special Agents- 10 Special Missions- 250+ Random Missions- New Bloon enemies - tougher Camos, Regrower Bloons, and the fearsome ZOMG- 3 different game modes- Freeplay mode after mastering a track- 3 difficulty settings and family-friendly theme so anyone can playAnd that's just the beginning - regular updates will keep Bloons TD 5 fresh, fun, and challenging for many months to come. Now it's time to pop some Bloons!Note on Permissions: Bloons TD 5 requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage so that you have the option to interact with rewarded video ads that earn free Monkey Money. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.
descriptionHTML:
Five-star tower defense with unrivaled depth and replayability.

Build awesome towers, choose your favorite upgrades, hire cool Special Agents, and pop every last invading Bloon in the best ever version of the most popular tower defense series in history.

Bloons TD 5 delivers hours of fun and challenging play to fans and new players alike, with awesome features like this:

- 21 powerful towers with Activated Abilities and 2 upgrade paths
- 50+ Tracks
- Two-player co-operative play on custom co-op tracks
- 10 Special Agents
- 10 Special Missions
- 250+ Random Missions
- New Bloon enemies - tougher Camos, Regrower Bloons, and the fearsome ZOMG
- 3 different game modes
- Freeplay mode after mastering a track
- 3 difficulty settings and family-friendly theme so anyone can play

And that's just the beginning - regular updates will keep Bloons TD 5 fresh, fun, and challenging for many months to come. Now it's time to pop some Bloons!

Note on Permissions: Bloons TD 5 requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage so that you have the option to interact with rewarded video ads that earn free Monkey Money. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.

comments: Got the game loged into Fb i have so missed this game only issue i have it uses a lot of memory. Good thing i have games that dont have progress so i update this grate game love the new trains.

Came back after a long break. I'm enjoying the updates and improvements I'm seeing. The frequency of updates keeps it interesting and there's always something to work towards. They don't make it impossible to score big ticket items like most games just have to strategize correctly and out in time and just about everything is within reach

Game keeps crashing ,having to re stall the game after every update due to bugs in the system. Very disappointed since I got over charge when buying gems on black Friday, no good hurting loyal high level players by over charging them. Would not recommend game to anyone. And when you do asked a question the customer support team threat you with  no support when you keep asking question over issues or when the update coming. I have found they hate when high level player answer back . I would not recommend game to new players.

March 2018 and it still crashes. Server errors with made up numbers and a broken promise that it will not happen again! Since the last update it's becoming impossible to edit the trains without frequent crashes! Also a different error message number every time! I have progressed very well In the game so far but all the fun is being sucked out by the need to constantly restart the game!

This game was great until the last update. That update has ruined the performance of the game. the graphics geet been improved, but the performance has degraded... please release a new version with better performance, or I will uninstall it... 1 week left

Definitely not a fan of the latest update. Graphics have become very choppy in an attempt to be "sleek".  Trains take twice as long to reach the station now.  Game crashes a lot more often.  I hope the developers fix these issues soon....or this may be the very update that finally gets me to quit.

comments: Love the game except for the new update. I have been saving up for a while for an elite pack and now that I have enough to purchase an elite card pack, you get rid of it! I have been wanting a diamond character and now you took it away from me. How can anyone get a diamond level character now. There is no way to purchase them either as they are elite pack exclusive cards. Not very happy. Waiting for this to be fixed until I'm satisfied.

Best game I have played, however after the updates i can't seem to see other game modes like faction wars challenge mode and even quest mode. I have reinstalled a couple of times, I have seen those missing modes in a novice account but whenever I log into my wbaccount they disappear leaving me with normal mode and  the tower mode.

This is so unfair,d last challenge i got was assassin Jade!. I have complained for months now but nothing has been done. It doesnt give me a level playing ground against others. I have missed out on shao khan, tremour, goro and so on. I am feeling left out but dont wanna uninstall. Pls do something

Love the game. Hackers though ruin it, especially in faction wars in hard and fatal battles. For the ones who just updated, faction wars will show up within 12/24 hrs however not sure bout quest mode. Been playing actively for over 2 years, but still don't have All maxed out equipment or all maxed out characters. Hackers have everything maxed out which makes a mockery of our equipment.

I love the game so much, it's fun and gory but I used to play this on my IPhone and I got a new phone and I can't transfer my data even with my Facebook connected to it. My new phone is a galaxy s8 and I wonder if I can transfer my iPhone account to my galaxy. I don't to start over while my other phone have great and exclusive characters. Please help.

I love the game and new update. But i am soo disapointed, that you promissed us Injustice raiden and klassic mileena, still there are no challenges about them. Please make a new challenge a bout those charecters. Also injustice scorpion, undercover cassie cage and others. Please make this right.
description: Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting of MORTAL KOMBAT X!Bring the power of next-gen gaming to your mobile and tablet device with this visually groundbreaking fighting and card collection game. Assemble an elite team of Mortal Kombat warriors and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament on Earth.BRUTAL 3 v 3 KOMBAT Create your own team of Mortal Kombat fighters and lead them into battle to earn experience, new special attacks, and powerful artifacts.MASSIVE ROSTER OF FIGHTERSCollect Mortal Kombat veterans like Scorpion, Johnny Cage, Sub-Zero, Sonya, Kitana, Ermac, and many others.¬† Discover the newest additions to Mortal Kombat such as the insect-like D‚ÄôVorah, fiery Cassie Cage, bloodthirsty Kotal Khan, and the mysterious Kung Jin.JAW DROPPING X-RAYS AND FATALITIESMortal Kombat X brings its trademark Fatalities and X-Rays to mobile, with stunning graphics, these over the top moves punch you right in the guts.CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERSCompete with other players in Faction Wars, an online competitive mode where players engage other player teams.¬† Rank up in your own Faction‚Äôs leaderboard to earn weekly prizes.SUMMON ALLIES INTO BATTLEFind other players to be your Ally. Borrow a kombatant and strike a decisive blow against your enemies.UNLOCK REWARDS IN BOTH THE CONSOLE AND MOBILE GAMEPlay the game and unlock exclusive rewards for the console version of Mortal Kombat X, including ultra rare characters like Klassic Kitana and Injustice Scorpion. descriptionHTML:
Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting of MORTAL KOMBAT X!
Bring the power of next-gen gaming to your mobile and tablet device with this visually groundbreaking fighting and card collection game.
Assemble an elite team of Mortal Kombat warriors and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament on Earth.

BRUTAL 3 v 3 KOMBAT
Create your own team of Mortal Kombat fighters and lead them into battle to earn experience, new special attacks, and powerful artifacts.

MASSIVE ROSTER OF FIGHTERS
Collect Mortal Kombat veterans like Scorpion, Johnny Cage, Sub-Zero, Sonya, Kitana, Ermac, and many others.  Discover the newest additions to Mortal Kombat such as the insect-like D’Vorah, fiery Cassie Cage, bloodthirsty Kotal Khan, and the mysterious Kung Jin.

JAW DROPPING X-RAYS AND FATALITIES
Mortal Kombat X brings its trademark Fatalities and X-Rays to mobile, with stunning graphics, these over the top moves punch you right in the guts.

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS
Compete with other players in Faction Wars, an online competitive mode where players engage other player teams.  Rank up in your own Faction’s leaderboard to earn weekly prizes.

SUMMON ALLIES INTO BATTLE
Find other players to be your Ally. Borrow a kombatant and strike a decisive blow against your enemies.

UNLOCK REWARDS IN BOTH THE CONSOLE AND MOBILE GAME
Play the game and unlock exclusive rewards for the console version of Mortal Kombat X, including ultra rare characters like Klassic Kitana and Injustice Scorpion. Playing the console version unlocks rewards in mobile as well.

NOTICE:
* Mortal Kombat X features high quality visuals. Performance is not optimized on devices with less than 1GB RAM.
** A minimum of 1.5 GB of free space is required on your device.
Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. Contains intense violence, blood, and gore.

comments: Amazing game very addictive...  Love the fact that they have a specials  more often... Also like the events with the second hospitals... Would like if we had special events more often... Just wish we had a platform to save the game my sister had to restart the game 6 times i had to do it twice... Wou be great to save progress on fb or another platform... Even log in  Really frustrating when we lose progress.... I only need 5 more characters then I'll have them all... So if i lose progress again im not starting over  Overall my favorite game on my phone!! Thx

I couldn't get enough patients, I couldn't get enough cash, and my staff energy seemed to drain way too fast. I love the surgery games but you maybe get one of those a day. I ended up uninstalling when room upgrades said they would take 12 hours. Too much waiting, not enough action. I liked the story so far too. Maybe I'll reinstall in the future if the times go down.

Controls don't work properly during surgery! There is lot of lag while performing an action while the timer works properly. Moreover, it doesn't allow me to suture the skin, even if I'm trying to do it right (it worked at the begining). Please fix these bugs or I will uninstal the game...

Love the overall feel of this, though some things need tweeking. For example, I only have half of the staff available and am now getting far too many duplicate cards concidering how many I have left to get. Makes it feel all too much like it's pushing people to spend real money, something that always ends with me deleting the game and moving on. Hope this doesn't happen in this case, but I'm not holding my breath...

It's a nice game, I like the concept, you get to operate on patients and manage a hospital. Problem with the recruitment part, it was always giving me surgeons and wasted 200 hearts on the same person. There should be an option if you want to fire someone or replace with another staff. The biggest issue is with their connectivity, internet connection is very stable works with all apps except for this one, no idea why. Fix it please I would hate to delete this game. Thanks.

This game will cheat you! I  upgraded a bunch of my characters but the next time I logged in nothing had saved! The funds I used to upgrade were also gone, of course. Don't waste money buying anything because the upgrades you make just disappear.
description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristicsüöë  Play the most realistic surgery simulationsüöë  Build your own hospitalüöë  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save livesüöë  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research departmentüöë  Dive into two captivating seasons üöë  Stay tuned! We‚Äôre continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You‚Äôll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
descriptionHTML:
Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital!

Game Characteristics

🚑 Play the most realistic surgery simulations
🚑 Build your own hospital
🚑 Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives
🚑 Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department
🚑 Dive into two captivating seasons
🚑 Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and content

PERFORM SURGERIES

Performing challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!

BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITAL

Build and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!

EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMA

Live dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors.

Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!

Mussenstraat 15
1223 RB Hilversum

comments: Been playing this game for 2 yes now and I upgraded my phone to a Google pixel. The game worked for a couple days, but now I just have a black screen. I won't uninstall yet because I've spent a few hundred dollars on this game.  Please fix any bugs with the Google pixel so I can get back to taping

I love this game and these developers! They took a week of their own time and helped me sync my account, which I bet was not easy. That alone deserves 5 stars, but the game itself is amazing. It's a great time waster and has tons of story and puzzles in the stories if you read them. So overall I give a 10 out of 5 stars!

This gamebis fun,i just got the game 5 ninutes ago and im doing very good on this game.you can farm gold. [By countunelessley killing enimies.]my guy deals 17.60 milloion damage per tap.i give this game 5 stars

Game is actually mindlessly fun. Climb the ladder and get stronger, and win tournaments. However, the game is not balanced for casual players and the development put a huge emphasis on pay to play. If you want to climb you really have to give up your life and keep climbing, and pay so you can simply redo your skills as you gain more. Hard to justify committing so much time.

Love the game! That is until I got a new phone(LG G6) that is plenty capable of playing this game. Now it opens to a black screen and sits there. I'd love to continue to play, but unless this is fixed, I'll look for something else, not that I want to...
The new Valentine's update is annoying. Whenever I try to log into my existing account it keeps on saying unable to connect to server. Please fix I still like this game.

comments: I'd really like to give this game a 5 star rating. Their customer service is fantastic. The graphics are great. Lots of missions to go on. And they have events every week. Exactly what I'd be looking for in a star trek game. But the thing I just can't get past is the gambling aspect for role playing. All I want to do is role play as a captain of a galaxy class starship. But after a month of almost daily spins at the Dabo table (including spending real money on the vip pass and dilithium, and rolling multiple times a day) I haven't gotten a single galaxy class schematic. I don't want to play borg, or klingon, or older enterprise (hell, I'd trade all of those for just a generic galaxy class). It doesn't seem fair the game doesn't give you a more direct way to role play as your favorite ship. Isn't that the whole point of a game like this?

Great collections of star trek universe, but the game screams micro transactions and gambling around every corner. The game gives you a great concept that gets hindered by currency gates. Only play if you want a nostalgic taste of star trek themed free to play game

I absolutely love this game! It's concept is (though not entirely unique to Star Trek) cool. I just love the voices for characters and would love more characters to have voices.  For the longest time I was a F2P player, and when Events first started I was constantly in the Top 1000 so don't buy into that "You have to pay to win" nonsense. If you do put money into this game make it the $4 Monthly Dilithium Card it is worth it $4 for 3000 Dilithium if you can afford it.

Don't listen to the haters who say it's Pay for Play and DB is a greedy company. It's bull, no amount of money will get you where time invested into the game will. Oh, and if the game even loads slow for a second DB is likely to send free stuff. If people complain about somthing...free stuff. So I say keep up the great work! One thing though, I'd be awesome if we could name our starbases. Just a thought.

Progress stalls unless you spend insulting amounts of money (dilithium prices are absurd) to get better characters. In the early days of the game you could progress easily, but now I feel as more high-paying players have joined they want you to spend money to progress, and their prices really are absurd. The game is fun, but they're greedy. In the events especially, those who pay more get significantly better awards. A bit disappointing for those of us that have supported the game with occasional purchases from the beginning.

Love everythinggg tho id like to like i want to controle the ship my self manuver it myself open world like eh thats my piont this might change the game and other peoples view/perspective pionts but it would complete my dream of getting the one thing i always love and always will love star trek.üòÅ

comments: I feel inlove with the game the second I opened it! being a huge naruto fan I had high expectations! and most of them were met.  I have two issues! it's seems the only way to get hero fragments is through the shops which is only 10 at a time. or special attack missions which keep changing! makes it very hard to awaken shinobi.  also why only 8 chapters in story mode! You have a whole two anime to base off and we only get 8 chapters! how disappointing.

I am a little disappointed in the game right now. I saved up for the Jiriya banner which is supposed to have a higher drop rate, got one Jiriya card in a multi 10xs summon. I would like to know why that happened seeing as with every other banner I have ever pulled on had numerous cards for that shinobi, sometimes even the full kit minus an ult. I am not looking for an ultimate every time. But when I pull on a banner I would like the rate to actually be reasonable thank you very much.

Everything was working just fine until not long ago. All of a sudden, everytime I try to play any kind of mission on my android, a message will pop up saying, 'Due to an unknown error the game will return to the title screen'. It's been happening for over a week now, I've tried to reinstall but nothing works. Please fix.

4 days ago i was having a problem of playing missions. I couldnt start it because the screen showed "due to an unknown error the game is returning to the title screen". The issue was resolved yesterday and again today the same old stuff. Is this a joke going on with my account?

To BANDAI NAMCO... Just suggesting a few thought about this game. I've taken liken this game more than any other I played so far.  I just thought during the mission about the choosen characters. I think this game will be more stratigical if you can switch characters during the mission. It just doesn't make any sense if the main character you control died right away. Since in a story there's still a chance to turn the table on your side. Just like in Naruto series though their team captain may die the subordinates will carry their will and a chance to win. And in this game,  If the main character died the rest automatically dies though there's still a lot of spare life. Hope you call consider.  Just making suggestion. Your AWESOME making this game BANDAI NAMCO.

I really like this game, the only reason im giving it a 1 star. Is because I've tried to send them a message involving an issue but I cant seem to find the way to do it. In regards to the issue I hope they see this message and fix it, for some reason it wont let me do any missions. I have updated it and deleted the cache but the problem persist.

a fusion of action and strategy!

from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

Simple controls that let you perform blazing fast combo attacks and all types of Ninjutsu!

Position traps and the Shinobi that you've trained

Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses. Try to get the

descriptionHTML:
Intercept, eliminate and extract. It’s time to engage the enemy.

Sniper Strike is a high-octane sniper experience that pits you in battle across three gameplay modes and hundreds of missions. Experience a AAA rated sniper game like never before on mobile.

Scout through immersive environments, engage in rapid-fire combat and build the ultimate super-soldier as you customise their state of the art gear.

Team up with Wolf, Jackson and the rest of Strike Force as you target hostiles and take down the evil Elite Order. Go head to head with friends in online combat and shoot to the top of the leaderboard.

● Wipe out Elite Commanders and their henchmen with satisfying kill shots!

● Buddy up with allies to cover Delta Team and rescue hostages.

● Seek out online friends (and foes) and challenge them to LIVE sniper duels!

● Join forces with Clan friends to smash missions, and prepare for the ultimate showdown with the Elite Order.

● The more you win, the better you play – upgrade and engage in harder, faster challenges that will send you flying up the leaderboard!

Whether you're engaged in live PvP sniper duels, rescuing hostages with breach specialist Wolf, or fighting to be the last man standing in arena mode, this is one epic FPS experience that you don't want to miss!

comments: Finally a mobile mmo that actually feels like a real mmorpg. Nice graphics, skills, open world questing, lots of players. Fights are engaging  and boss fights are spectacular and interactive. You do need a team for dungeons and raids as you can't just 1 shot everything, like in other mobile mmos. I've tried loads but this is the best by far! Keep it up!

Man, this is a perfect 5/7! Out of a crapton of Mu Origin game clones, this is even better than original! Polished graphics, nice player skills set, awesome UI items layout - everything is top notch! The only thing I can wish for is adding camera turn on top of player strafe via joystick. Thanks for the hard work, and please keep it up!

Great mobile MMO! Good graphics and narration so the story stays interesting. Additionally...SO much Co-op and PvP and a lot of things to give an edge. Not P2P dominated either so far. Obviously the grind to 55 is tough but I have a few characters on different servers there still very possible.

I think this game is amazing for an MMO mobile. It has a feeling of blade and soul and WOW and the graphics sre amazing on my Razer phone! Actually feels like a real MMO, and I like that there are character voices.  Only problem I am having is whenever I go to turn the Volume up or down all sound cuts out and won't come back on until i restart the game. So I need to pre-set my volume before launching the game and then not touch the volume while playing.

I'm furious.  First you guys fix the Android problem. Now I run thru the update and a screen pops up that I need to relaunch game because it's out of date. How when I literally JUST watched it update? I've spent a lot of time on this game and really like it but if I can't even get to the character select screen, why would I keep it on my phone. It's a shame, it really is.

Could not even start playing. At the start screen the audio is pushing and choppy. This persisted into the game itself, turning off the music did not help, though turning off all sound did. Not playing this type of game without sound. I have a Note 8, so a top of the pine phone, so it's not me running  a phone that can't handle this type of game

descriptionHTML:
The Desolation Wall has fallen after 700 years of peace, it’s now up to you and your allies to battle the demon hordes occupying your land!

Adventure in this Vast 3D Fantasy Open World redefining the MMORPG experience on mobile. Start your journey by selecting either Ranger, Warrior, Mystic, Paladin, Elementalist Classes, each with their own distinct strengths and characteristics.

BATTLE SYSTEMS

•Join up to 40 guild mates as you take on bosses and collect loot in Dungeon Raids
•Prove yourself in Arena Battle with 1v1, 3v3, and 5v5 modes and participate to unlock powerful gear sets
•Show-off your superior skills and defend your glory as you take part in large scale battles
•Put your survival instincts to the test as you take part in Battle Royale mode

IMMERSIVE GAMEPLAY

•PC quality graphics to immerse you in this impressive MMO game on mobile
•300+ hours of gameplay including hundreds of paths for your hero
•Vibrant fantasy world with the ability to reach the coveted legendary status of level 55

CUSTOMIZATION

•Thousands of available weapons, armor, clothes and more
•Collect rare items providing specific advantages which players can combine to become powerful
•50 unique mounts from a flying carpet to a fire breathing dragon

SOCIAL

•Chat with players around the world utilizing the integrated voice system
•Take in-game selfies, share personalized heroes, and your favorite moments with friends on social media

comments: This is just amazing! Once you get started it gets a little tough, but you can have other people help you if your stuck. I love the easy gameplay and the graphics, The only problem I have with it is how hard I is to get ninja pearls without money, I'm young and dont have a credit card or job yet so I miss quite a few opportunities. I highly recommend to any Naruto fans.

This game is very great and can be addicting. The only problem u have is that when ever I try to play a mission it always says there is a communication error. I would really like to keep playing the game, so if there is anything you could do about it- that would be great.

your servers are bad.. trying to hunt Chino but 2 times already when we finish the last map and i see the yellow card of the last boss, then i get connection lost and don't get a thing in the end.. it is really frustrating to play for 15 minutes, see your goal fulfilled but then.. nooooo, you don't get the cards in the end

I love the game, but during multi-player, especially in impact missions, let us continue even if player 1 gives up. It's extremely annoying when you play to the boss, and their hp is very low,  and player 1 leaves and all that time was for nothing. Let player 2 and 3 continue, even if player 1 and 3 or 1 and 2 quit, let that last player control the other two. That's the only improvement I can think of for the next update.

I'm only putting it as one star in hopes the devs see this, but please find a better way to recover accounts. I've been a fan of this game for years and when I logged in I was logged out, I have no idea what my transfer info is because I've only had to do that once. I don't want to just start over, please find a better way for people to get their accounts back once your update logs them out.
It's not the best game but because I am a fan of naruto my interest in this game might be different than others would think. Overall its a decent mobile game but it could use some more improvements.

descriptionHTML:
NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing – Join the battle with your favorite NARUTO characters, fighting in Shinobi Formation Battles across the story of the renowned anime!

Fight hordes of enemies and complete missions using the all-new Shinobi Formation Battle system: a strategic RPG fighting system that unleashes exhilarating combination attacks with your allies. Master team field skills, discover new ninjutsu and become the next Hokage in the first-ever Ultimate Ninja mobile game!

NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing Features:

Battle Enemies with Your Ninja Dream Team!
• Control over 100 NARUTO heroes, each with their own unique attacks and tactics
• Fight enemies using ninjutsu, powerful special techniques and combination attacks
• Unleash ninjutsu abilities for powerful offensive strikes, defensive abilities that can stop enemy movement, and more

Mission Mode Based On the Original Anime Storyline!
• Mission Mode allows you to relive the experience of the NARUTO story
• Battle through stories from the original series

Ninja Skills and Powerful Attacks!
• Fighting skills include close-ranged and combination attacks for massive damage
• Ninja Field Skills can turn the tide of battle in your favor
• Fighting closely with your team allows for great opportunity, but also great risk

Fight Ninjas from Around the World in Online Multiplayer Games!
• Battle against other ninjas in multiplayer mode
• Join together and take on missions with up to 3 other ninjas

New Games in Monthly Phantom Castle Events!
• Compete against other ninjas for the most points and aim for the top in a special mode that can only be accessed during special events
• Battle against a multitude of enemies that await you as you climb the Phantom Castle

Join the battle with your favorite NARUTO characters! Download NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing now and become the next Hokage!

descriptionHTML:
We welcome you to the legendary world of wise Kings, great Lords and valiant Heroes. Walk the exciting path of a city builder and warlord! Assemble an army of faithful warriors in gleaming armor. Create a powerful Order and demonstrate your might to players from all over the world. Glorious victories in bloody battles for supremacy in the Kingdom and the brutal struggle for the ancient Throne are just a small part of all the adventures that await you in the lands of fearless rulers.

From the moment you begin the game, the atmosphere of a medieval town in an expansive Kingdom, courageous marches, battles and ancient riches will take you on an unforgettable journey. My Lord, your vassals are waiting for your orders!

Throne: Kingdom at War is free to play. You can purchase in-game currency in exchange for real money. It gives you the ability to buy various boosts and items that will make your gaming experience more dynamic and exciting. If you want to switch off this option, you can set a password in the Google Play Store menu to prevent any unwanted purchases.

Game features:
- Access to a completely free mode
- High-grade graphics and sound
- Localization into multiple languages
- You can create your own Order or join an existing one
- Dynamic real-time battles with players from all over the world
- Several troop classes to choose from: knights, spearmen, ranged, cavalry, siege, scouts
- Armor, weapons and other equipment crafting for your Hero
- Numerous quests and errands with valuable rewards

We are constantly improving the app, making it better and more entertaining. You also can help us sending your feedback and suggestions.

comments: I hate to say it but what I thought at first was a cool extra is now ruining the game. It's no longer competitive on skill, it's just about how much you are willing to pay to get upgrades which negates any skill involved. It's just a money grab. If you don't pay and upgrade you lose!  Simple as that. So if you want a game with skill this is no longer it. If you want a game to empty your wallet to feed your ego then this is the game for you!

Super glitchy!!! Love this game but I'm getting crazy annoyed!! Lost my lucky spins used one and it took 4 off me!!! The game has done this multiple times!! It needs to bed fixed, remove all the bloody adds.

Could you guys maybe cool it with the damn ads? I can't even navigate the menus now without a 60% chance of getting a 15 second video about some crappy game with "war", "clash" or "clans" in the title...  Other than that, the gameplay itself is ok. Aside from maybe the lowered necessity for Tetrises because of power-ups or the annoying-ass "some pieces are affected by gravity, but we won't point it which ones until you cause them to drop by attempting to set up your next move" mechanic.  Seriously though, those ads after EVERY GAME NOW are cancer on toast. Knock it off.

description: Get ready for the very big adventure with very small heroes! The sequel to the award-sometimes-winning-and-if-not-we're-just-happy-to-be-nominated Best Fiends! But it's nothing like that game! Except that it's got the same characters, and you're still beating up slugs. But it's a clicker adventure, which is different, and we think a lot of fun!* TRAVEL through the world of Minutia, beating up bad guys!* SLAP, COLLECT & LEVEL UP pretty much everything in the game!* LEARN MATH trying to understand how much damage you're doing!* LOSE TOUCH with your family and friends!* RECOMMEND it to people you don't like!Story: The Fiends finally made it to Mount Boom, only to be defeated and imprisoned in very similar boxes. Now it's time for YOU to turn the tables! Round up the old gang, level them up and defeat wave after wave of slugs as you make your way to the elusive villain behind the Slug Invasion!With the help of the Fiends, and the awesome reckoning power of Mount Boom, and the magical souvenirs that boost your strength, and whatever new stuff we come up with down the line, you'll save the world in no time. And then realize there's more to this game than even that! And then hate us for making a game you can't stop playing!And there's no energy mechanics, you can play it whenever you want, for as long as you want! Which is good, since you've obviously got some time on your hands if you bothered to read this far through the description. So get it already. Best Fiends FOREVER!-------------PLEASE rate Best Fiends Forever - Your feedback helps us make Best Fiends Forever the best game experience possible!Join more than 2,000,000+ people and counting in the Best Fiends community. We love hearing your feedback, seeing your fan art (fanart@seriously.com) and fighting slugs together!* Facebook (facebook.com/bestfiends)* Instagram (instagram.com/bestfiends)* Twitter (twitter.com/bestfiends)* YouTube (youtube.com/bestfiends)* Snapchat (snapchat.com/add/bestfiends)* VK (vk.com/bestfiendsofficial)Privacy policy: https://www.seriously.com/privacy-policy/Terms of Service: https://www.seriously.com/terms-of-service/
descriptionHTML:
Get ready for the very big adventure with very small heroes! The sequel to the award-sometimes-winning-and-if-not-we're-just-happy-to-be-nominated Best Fiends! But it's nothing like that game! Except that it's got the same characters, and you're still beating up slugs. But it's a clicker adventure, which is different, and we think a lot of fun!

* TRAVEL through the world of Minutia, beating up bad guys!
* SLAP, COLLECT & LEVEL UP pretty much everything in the game!
* LEARN MATH trying to understand how much damage you're doing!
* LOSE TOUCH with your family and friends!
* RECOMMEND it to people you don't like!

Story: The Fiends finally made it to Mount Boom, only to be defeated and imprisoned in very similar boxes. Now it's time for YOU to turn the tables! Round up the old gang, level them up and defeat wave after wave of slugs as you make your way to the elusive villain behind the Slug Invasion!

With the help of the Fiends, and the awesome reckoning power of Mount Boom, and the magical souvenirs that boost your strength, and whatever new stuff we come up with down the line, you'll save the world in no time. And then realize there's more to this game than even that! And then hate us for making a game you can't stop playing!

And there's no energy mechanics, you can play it whenever you want, for as long as you want! Which is good, since you've obviously got some time on your hands if you bothered to read this far through the description. So get it already. Best Fiends FOREVER!

-------------

PLEASE rate Best Fiends Forever - Your feedback helps us make Best Fiends Forever the best game experience possible!

comments: I used to play this game and it never gave me the option of saving before and it still doesn't. That was over a year ago. I love this game but when I had to get a new phone I had to start all over, so I didn't play for a long time. I just recently redownloaded it and it still doesn't have a save option. When are you going to change that? I play one of your other games and it has a save option. When are you going to give this game a save option because I have mentioned it before and nothing has changed. I want to keep playing but I would also like a Google play save option in case I have to get a new device.

This is a great app. It has great graphics and doesnt make up anything from the actual show like other games do. My little sister is just crazy for this game. She even pursuaded her friends to get this game! Amazing game, no flaws. Definetly worth 5 stars!

I like this game. But there's a bug. When I try to watch a video to play a mini game for free, the video freezes but the pop up ads don't freeze.... It doesn't make sense.  Why add pop up ads when we're already watching them for the free mini games.  At first I couldnt put this game down, I became addicted, but since the bug started to happen, I started to lose interest.

I'm not sure what happened but my game reset. What also stinks is my game used to be glitchy when I'd leave the game a day later and come on, not even two seconds passed in the game. If highly suggest to stay on online mode since that seems like the only mode that keeps time

This is bullcrap! This is the second time this game has all of a sudden stopped working and I cannot get back in to play. I am soo disappointed that you keep letting this happen!! I seriously could use some HELP!!! Please FIX this issuse immediately!!! I want to continue to play MLP... :'(

I will give this game 5 stars if u can get some help.  When ever I try to open my inbox to look at my shards or collect the hearts I have been sent,  my game just crashes. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game,  playing offline,  clearing the cache data and almost everything else I can think of. Also when I try doing anything with twilight I can't do any tasks, plus I can't find twiligr either.  Please help me. I love this game. But I may stop because it keeps crashing

descriptionHTML:
Saddle up for fun friendship and adventure with all of the most popular ponies in Equestria in the free official game based on the phenomenal MLP TV show!
Only Twilight Sparkle -- the student of Princess Celestia -- and her friends Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and the rest can save the day for every horse in the city as they farm resources, meet cute friends and reach for their dreams!
* OVER 300 CHARACTERS: Meet a royal prince or princess one day, a cute adventure-seeking horse the next day and who knows what the next! Give them places to stay, nibble on hay and hear what they have to say.
* SO MUCH TO EXPLORE: See the Crystal Empire, Canterlot, Sweet Apple Acres farm and more!
* MAKE A PRETTY PONY HOME: Beautify your MLP town and make it better than in any other city sims out there with cute houses, adorable decorations and enough magic for everypony that gallops by!
* FANTASTIC QUESTS: Go on adventures based on your favorite stories from the TV show, and confront villains such as Tirek, King Sombra, Nightmare Moon, the Changelings and more!
* MINI-GAMES: Play Ball Bounce with Twilight Sparkle, Magic Wings with Rainbow Dash, and get down with every horse in town in the Equestria Girls Dance games!
* CUSTOM FASHION: Give cute makeovers to turn any pony into a prince or princess pony with royal dresses and beautiful hairstyles featuring a rainbow of colors.
* FRIENDSHIP IS MAGIC: Interact with friends and compete in hoof-pounding events!
* REAL PONY VOICES: Enjoy the official voice talent from the show!
Perfect for fans of city-builder sims, free games or anyone who dreams of lounging on a pile of hay on the farm, surrounded by cute MLP horse friends such as Twilight Sparkle and Rainbow Dash, and becoming a royal prince or princess.

descriptionHTML:
The Tribez is not just a game where you build a farm! The Tribez is an adventure where you travel to a distant past full of secrets, mysteries, and many hours of addictive exploration of an unknown, but beautiful world! You are invited to visit a primitive world inhabited by a peace-loving people, who have been hidden beyond a miles-deep portal from time immemorial. Build your own stone-age village, explore territorieshidden by mountains and seas, farm fertile lands, and lead your tribe, which considers you sent by the gods, to prosperity. The Tribez is a world in which you feel alive!

REVIEWS:
‘The Tribez’ is the insanely popular empire-building game that’s revolutionizing the idea of social gaming.’ (http://www.thedailybeast.com/)
‘The design is so beautiful and there is so much detail that it's a real pleasure to navigate through the scenes and help the villagers.’ (http://www.appszoom.com)
‘What makes The Tribez genuinely pleasant to play is the attention paid to the graphics.’ (http://www.gamezebo.com)

KEY FEATURES:
✔ This game works when you’re offline too – play it on a plane, in the subway or in the car. Enjoy!
✔ Simple, intuitive controls.
✔ Adorable characters you’ll love! Meet the farmer, the builder, the tax collector, and many others!
✔ A beautiful vibrant world you'll be immersed into instantly.
✔ Lively animations make the prehistoric world come to life. You’ll be mesmerized by how the crops growon the farm and how the builders work on construction sites.
✔ Tons of items, characters, buildings, and decorations.
✔ Truly inexhaustible possibilities to develop your own stone-age empire by producing goods, increasingyour population, expanding your borders and attempting to farm the best lands.
✔ Hundreds of captivating quests: search for treasure and artifacts, discover distant islands, explore mysterious caves, grow unusual crops on your farm, and much, much more!

The game uses in-app purchases. In-app purchases can speed up gameplay.

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Your island has turned emerald green, which means it‚Äôs time for Spring Celebrations. Alas, the wicked leprechauns stole all the gold from your village! Find gold bars, build a Leprechaun Castle and get a Leprechaun Shop as a reward.

‚Ä¢ Soon you‚Äôll meet Tapi. Help her babies hatch, protect them from murlods, and help Tapi find a home on your island. Complete all the quests in time; you‚Äôll receive a generous reward and a Seeker's Hut to bring you valuable resources.

comments: I absolutely love the story line and I've spent more on the game than I'd like to admit. But spending money doesn't really get you much farther because the energy goes so quickly. I think you would get far better reviews and more happy customers if you got rid of the energy system and upped the ads for more revenue from that standpoint. Then you could keep the micro transactions for the secret scenes. This way you'd still be making money,  but your customer retention would go up. I have so many ideas that would help this app out and I'd love to share them as I love this story. If you are interested in what I have to say please reply

I love the game. Wish we didnt have to pay for every secret scene and had a little bit more energies before having to wait for more or buy some. Would be great if we had more options for free energy. Love the story and characters. Hurry with season two already!!!  Im anxious to see further stories on ryan and the character Lol ‚ù§.

It's really a good game. It's awesome! But that energies are my main problem! Don't you think that...... only 300 energies that means only 30 lines are not enough and too little for a day..!?..!???!.. and 10 energies per line isn't too much!!??! Please make it down to 5 energies for each lines...and only for dialogues.. And if you give 500 or 100 energies (if 1 line cost 5 energies then there will be only 100 or 200 lines. Not much for a whole day!!!!!) and take 10 hours to get free energies again then the game will be perfect!! Everyone can't buy energies (including me)! You know! Please consider this case sympathetically.!.!..  I beg you.....!....

Lovely story line... love story that keeps you coming back everyday.... at times we are urged to buy energies.. however the energy provided gives sufficient dosage of the story each day... sad that it's going to get to the end...  And i wish I could go back and re read certain moments which is not possible.... apart from it.. this is amazing...

Great storylines!!! Great graphics!  However the energy to even do one chapter is way too low!!!  There should be more choices in filling up the energy.  Let your veiwers choose to watch more ad's or something similar to games where each day you can have one chapter and keep the secret moments as a paid option.  I myself would  have more of my friends play,share and even buy if the cost wasn't $100+ for ten chapters!  Oh and FYI check your editing just a few hiccups in a few clips.   Huge fan on the writer/authors...  Very steamy!! Sincerely JR

This game is misleading. You can only play the "secret scenes" if you pay, but the wording makes it sound like your choice so you keep playing in hopes you can see one. And the secret scenes I assume are the ones which actually push the relationship forward. The game staggers and is deeply misleading.

descriptionHTML:
Nu conteaza daca esti un jucator cu experienta sau un incepator, in Poker Romania asiguram o experienta reala pentru niveluri diferite! Joaca impreuna cu prietenii tai reali si impotriva a mii de jucatori conectati!

1. Aplicatie gratuita, poti juca deasemenea si prin intermediul contului tau de Facebook!
2. mese aseaza-te si porneste si turnee zilnice!
3 Mii de jucatori conectazi in fiecare zi!
4. Joaca impreuna cu prietenii si fati prieteni noi, aici!
5. Verifica unde joaca prietenii tai si alatura-te lor oricand!

Acest joc este destinat adultilor, pentru distractie si petrecerea timpului liber. Nu se castiga premii in bani reali in urma succesului in cadrul jocului, iar acest succes nu garanteaza rezultate similare si in cazul unui joc avand mize in bani reali.

comments: Really fun at fisrt, but after a month or two of playing planet shields become way to strong. Even with the dark matter bonuses and increased infectivity from your bacteria slots it takes too many attacks and nanos. The game desprately needs a way to penetrate shields, or reduce shield strength.

One of the best idle clickers out there, excellent progression and upgrade systems, lots of extra features that keep you playing. I played daily for about 60 days in a row. Got bored after the 3nd black hole for some reason.
How does one get the achievement No Time To Lose?  And, please fix the scrolling.  Whenever I scroll any list, it snaps back again. EDIT: The best I've seen of its kind.

The game is a decent enough time waster. However, when you begin getting into higher numbers the game breaks. I have over 100x the required about of bacteria to destroy a planet but it still says i can only take out 99.48%.  I have currently 75.528 oo bacteria and the planet Esloytis says it requires 47.310 nn bacteria to complete, but im at 99.7%. The numbers being dealt with are literally astronomical and unfathomable as a human, but following the progression of the game so far it would seem i have fathoms more bacteria than should be required.

I am not really happy with the new update... The colony prices have been increased... Now it would take even more time to collect the amount of bacteria needed to destroy a planet... Please change it back to its old colony costs... Overall, the game is awesome...

Good game, but $3.79 a month to remove ads? Most games have a one time payment to remove ads and it's usually less than that. Only $13 a month for World of Warcraft. There's SLIGHTLY better value for your dollar there.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome, Doctor! We've been waiting for you. Everything is prepared for you to take over and start cultivating bacteria to initiate BACTERIAL TAKEOVER!

We will start by taking over the smallest planets and move on to more difficult ones with a larger population and stronger infection resistance. We will need billions, trillions, quadrillion and even more bacteria to attack these planets. Which means your expertise in expanding and upgrading our bacterial colonies will be irreplaceable!

Build colonies, buy upgrades and generate bacteria on your own till you have enough to destroy planets and discover new powerful mutations! Remember that Plague is caused by the bacteria and it is our strength.

Bacterial Takeover is a mobile clicker and also idle game which allows you to become an evil genius that is set out to use biological weapons to destroy the whole Universe.

Main Features

- Explore universe and Destroy Planets
- Produce Nanobots and Bacteria
- Research Black Holes and Planets
- Evolve, Irradiate, and Mutate new Bacteria, overcome bacterial resistance
- Choose your Playstyle, a Tapping (clicking) or Idling
- Hoard Minerals, Gene Strands, Dark Matter and much more…

Join the community
https://www.facebook.com/bacterialTakeover/

Learn more
http://wiki.bacterialtakeover.com

descriptionHTML:
In Asphalt 8, you’ll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you’ll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!

REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!
• Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.
• Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!
• Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.
• Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!

GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8
• Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!
• Perform barrel rolls & wild 360º jumps to soar past your opponents.
• Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.

EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS
• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!
• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.
• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!

AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!
• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.
• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.
• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.
• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!
• A detailed damage system.

THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!
• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!
• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.
• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.
• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.
• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.

MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL
• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.

CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION
• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play.

So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!
__

comments: This has a lot of potential. Connection issues are horrendous after this last update. Also, add a help section that explains what everything means. Lots of stats, numbers, ratings, etc. that we have to figure out on our own. Another thing, stopped receiving notifications after updating to Oreo.
Overall it's pretty fun and addicting.  My only real issue came up with today's update. My 40-rated team got matched to play against a 60-rated team in my first Challenge game. wut

The game was great until the update. Took my team from a 43 to a 41. Put alot of time into it, hope this gets worked out. They also nerfed training. Don't even bother wasting 15 coins on an extra session.

Update: ***500 coins for ~350k in game cash isnt even 1 rookie signing.... you can get 3 star players for that kind of coin. **** the latest updates have added cool new features like the coach analysis, fewer bugs and more consistency. The coach analysis function could be cool but every description is "this player is making great progress, keep pushing him!" Even for aging players who are getting worse as the seasons progress. It does however project where the player could trend stats wise.  Still no goalie stats. Still no trade options (not sure how that would wotk) but they added refunds to contracts you release from your roster which depend on the player and their contract value,  time remaining etc...  Would be cool to also be able to make in game adjustments, like if your star goalie is letting goal after goal slip through swapping goal tenders would be nice otherwise there doesn't really seem to be a point in having 2 goalies even on the roster.  Overall it's a Fun game with a LOT of potential, if you're a fan of hockey you should definitely give this a try. Would like to see some of these things as the game develops

Please fix how it automatically signs a new player if you don't renew a contract.. the purpose is to dump cap space and it signs some random player and then won't let me release him.  Also STOP changing my line ups. At any point any time ever. There's no need to change it or else you night as well play the game for me. I spend alot of time re doing them and then next thing I know every thing is changed. Not sure why or what causes it buy it is annoying as hell

Overall it is a decent game. However finding an opponent for the games especially the rank games sucks. Either you get another player who is far superior to you or another who is far below your level. It needs to be more equal to be fun.

comments: it's such a fun game I love it! only problem is you have wait about an hour to play the next chapter bc you need tickets for each chapter and u can't choose many outfits and hair styles without diamonds and you only get a few..... moral is you have to pay for tickets and diamonds to continued the story make some choices and change hair and clothes

Not worth it. The stories are TERRIFIC.  problem is you can only have 1 ticket per hour. If you wait 2 hours for 2 tickets your still going to get 1. The only way u could have more than 2 is if u purchase . So for that reason I'm installing sorry I can't wait that Long and sometimes I'm barely active and can only read 1 chapter is just not my thing.

It's alright. The stories are super good. But the GEMS üíé are sooooo bad!!! You get 20 or something to start with and you can't do anything exciting without having Gems. So I'm gonna uninstall because im sick of waiting for gems. If you didn't have the whole gem problem then this game would be amazing. PLEASE SORT IT OUTTTT!!! {then it would be 5 stars easily!}

This is a great game. But everytime I try to open the game it crashes. Not to mention I just bought lots of tickets to read the chapters and now I can't use them because the game keeps crashing. Either fix this or give me my money back.

To make your own choices.... You need gems!   Well too bad there's no way to get more free gems.  You get 1 gem for reading a chapter.  But that's not near enough to actually make the choices you want.  If that was fixed and you could get more free gems,  game would be more awesome

The stories can get a bit addicting. However, the tickets you need to read them are ridiculous. I can go to sleep, wake up, and only have one ticket. It says you can speed up to get another ticket by watching adds. That's OK. But I've watched so many adds and haven't received even one ticket for them. Honestly debating on deleting it. Seems like a big waste to have to wait so long. Especially when you like to read the stories. There's a couple apps that are better. And you can get further with. It seems the only way to actually enjoy this app the way I want to is to spend money to buy tickets. Why spend money when I can just open a book?

comments: Pls end up with Brunooooo!! Dont fail me pls!! üòçüòç
Can't stop playing

Excellent storyline, graphics, and doesn't waste your time with ads. This is how the e type of games should be done. The only thing that would make it better is if they actually gave out gems. This is their 1 downfall - not receiving any gems at all. Therefore, you are forced to either buy them or select the choice you didn't really want in order to get the free choice. Still this is a wonderful game that I would highly recommend.

comments: I love this game. It's very dynamic and the gameplay is good too. The only problem I have is every single time I do PvP... It pairs me with an opponent far greater than what I can hope to beat. Sure, that's great for improving, but it disheartens me and makes me feel like a horrible player when I can't even beat ONE PvP opponent, ever, while playing the game. I would suggest to the devs that the matching system be a little more flexible when pairing. Give us a matching system that will actually give us lesser prepared players too so we can have the fun of winning, as well. Also, I am disconnected every single time I do PvP battles and bounties. Quite unstable, unfortunately.

Amazing shooter game, awesome hero collecting game, great multiplayer game. Definitely suggest that you at least try it out. But one thing you should look out for, it's pretty easy to sink between 5 and 20 dollars a week into this. Sometimes even 40 to 60. But, it's pretty free-to-play friendly if you can't afford to buy some gold.

I really like the game. It's fun and has enough activities and quests to keep you occupied for a while. My only complaint is how they match people up for the PVP missions. Sometimes you get matched up with people with far higher power and Team level menu which makes it nearly impossible to win. other than that I really enjoy the game

Super fun game. I haven't got bored of the game because there's always events going on which is good. One of the better if not the best shooting game I've played. I think there is a slight glitch when using Steele. Sometimes after I activate his open fire skill he doesn't shoot when I press the shoot button.

Latest update definitely made the game harder. I used to run 4 gauntlet levels with little issue but now I can't get through 1 without losing people. Resurrected characters are completely unwelcome and unfair in pvp when you tell on kills for money. Probably going to uninstall, you're welcome for the money Hothead

Starts off ok but then the pay walls creep in and you are constantly bombarded with prompts to spend money. The PVP is absolutely pointless, highest power rating wins every time without exception so you know if you've won or lost as soon as it picks an opponent. Needs a lot of work before I'd consider dropping any real money on it.

comments: I wasnt sure about this series at first, but it's really grown on me. The unique art style, interesting characters and immersive world make this an incredible game, especially considering it's a free mobile app! I would definitely love to see more sims like this in the future, (especially with the bad boy type). Seeing it transfer to desktop would be awesome! Overall, everything about this game is wonderful but, like everyone else says, the amount of energy given for free isn't enough! I think it would be wise to either lower the cost of energy actions take, give more free energy out, or split the story into parts in which 1 part can be played for free each day. Other than that it's a great sim!

My absolute favorite of all of the Is it Love games. Colin is an amazing character with an equally amazing backstory, and the way he connects with the MC is just incredible. The twists and turns in each chapter leave me craving more of the story. The energy they give you is somewhat lacking, but I'm used to it by now. Highly reccomend!

Really don't like how the guy treats the girl, what a scumbag! Plus I've been playing for over a week and the plot is unbelievably slow, the energy doesn't last long enough. There are much better otome style games out there.

Well the energy situation is beyond annoying. You only get very little for free and the prices for the energy and just WAY too expensive. I do like the story a lot though and will probably take 8 years to complete the story so I don't have to pay 50 bucks

OK, so I absolutely agree with everyone that the energy you get for free is nowhere near enough & packages are too expensive for what you get. I know, I've bought many. This story particular started bad, but now that I'm at the end, I'm hooked. Please continue to update. I have lots of bought energy going to waste!!

I don't really like the concept of earning energy every 24 hours. But I've got to say every time i see that message when my energy runs out. It leaves me on a cliffhanger and it keeps me in the story. Even if the energy wasn't there i would still play the game to my hearts content! Overall AMAZING story and characters!!

description: Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.Of bikers and outlaws ‚Äì the story:Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn‚Äôt have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don‚Äôt see, don‚Äôt listen, don‚Äôt tell. And most importantly, don‚Äôt get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn‚Äôt just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me. Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. descriptionHTML:
Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:

Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.


Of bikers and outlaws – the story:

Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn’t have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don’t see, don’t listen, don’t tell. And most importantly, don’t get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn’t just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me.
Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. My bike always was more to me than just a vehicle. So founding my own motorcycle club and painting the streets red with my fellas ever since felt natural. Together we keep the streets free of those who think can mess with us.


That’s what you ought to do:

Just out of jail and free again but with your own district now that you can manage from underground it is your duty to start your career as a gangster anew and found your own mc club. Your goal must be to expand the Motorcycle Club (MC) and rule the district with the help of your biker friends. Earn money, expand your influence and attack and rob other players in game. But watch out! The cops got their eyes everywhere so always remember to briber them and be sure that they keep their eyes shut and stay out of your business.
With fortunes and tactic you’ll be the king of the road and rule them with merciless severity.

In game Features:

Bloody Roads, California is a strategy and building game, that asks for strategic thinking, fortunes and tactic. These are the features you get in the game and that will keep you entertained and on the edge of your seat for hours.

• Found your very own MC
• Fight against bikers from other players in merciless streetwars
• Get onto your chopper and built up your own empire
• Earn money by running tattoo studios, bars and other establishments, to expand and built up your MC
• Train your bikers to keep your business going.
• Have a blast with this multiplayer strategy game

description: One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving games ever made! And it's free!Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon! Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. Watch out though - Bill's stout neck is not what it used to be when he was a kid! And his good old gasoline crematorium will easily run out of fuel.Features: - Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: bike, truck, jeep, tank, etc.) - Tuneable parts include engine, suspension, tires and 4WD - Numerous stages with levels to reach in each (Countryside, Desert, Arctic and the Moon! +++) - Share your score with a screenshot with your friends! - Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation - Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets) - Real turbo sound when you upgrade your engine! - Garage mode: build and drive your dream vehicle with custom parts! - Get new boosters to drive even further - 27+ Levels! - 28+ Vehicles!Vehicles: jeep, motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, hippie van, onewheeler, quad bike, tourist bus, race car, police car, ambulance, fire truck, snow mobile, super offroad, and many more! Hill Climb Racing is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are hard at work creating new vehicles, levels, features and of course fixing any issues you may find. So we'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game to support@fingersoft.net and please include your device make and model.Follow Us:* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Fingersoft* Twitter: @fingersoft* Web: https://www.fingersoft.net* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hillclimbracing_officialTerms of Use: http://fingersoft.net/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://fingersoft.net/privacyHill Climb Racing is a registered trademark of Fingersoft Ltd. All rights reserved.
descriptionHTML:
One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving games ever made! And it's free!

Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon!

Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. Watch out though - Bill's stout neck is not what it used to be when he was a kid! And his good old gasoline crematorium will easily run out of fuel.

Features:
- Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: bike, truck, jeep, tank, etc.)
- Tuneable parts include engine, suspension, tires and 4WD
- Numerous stages with levels to reach in each (Countryside, Desert, Arctic and the Moon! +++)
- Share your score with a screenshot with your friends!
- Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation
- Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets)
- Real turbo sound when you upgrade your engine!
- Garage mode: build and drive your dream vehicle with custom parts!
- Get new boosters to drive even further
- 27+ Levels!
- 28+ Vehicles!

Vehicles: jeep, motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, hippie van, onewheeler, quad bike, tourist bus, race car, police car, ambulance, fire truck, snow mobile, super offroad, and many more!

Hill Climb Racing is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.

Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are hard at work creating new vehicles, levels, features and of course fixing any issues you may find. So we'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game to support@fingersoft.net and please include your device make and model.

descriptionHTML:
The definitive high-definition FINAL FANTASY game for mobile phones!

Key Features:

■ A deep story and stunning visuals.
Experience an exciting story penned by Kazushige Nojima of FINAL FANTASY VII and FINAL FANTASY X fame, visualized with 3-D graphics never before seen in an RPG for mobile phones!
Each chapter release will be accompanied by grand in-game events adding new playable content and exciting customization items for your character!


■ A new and refined RPG turn-based battle.
Experience a new battle system specifically designed for mobile devices, creating highly tactical battles where each action flows into the next, chaining attacks and abilities in a rhythmic flow that brings destruction to your foes!


■ FINAL FANTASY's vaunted "Job System" returns.
Delve into a deep character customization system allowing for a near limitless number of combinations between job classes and specialized elemental abilities.
Choose your job, build your "deck," and destroy your enemies!



--------------------------------------

■Story: The Warrior of Light

Despair has cast a long, dark shadow across this land. The winds have stopped, the seas churn, and the earth rots.

The people await for a hero to appear—the hero foretold in an ancient prophecy: "When darkness shrouds the land, the Warrior of Light will come. Hope rides in his wake."

After a long journey across the Ether, castaways without pasts appear on the shores of Palamecia. One of them is destined to become the warrior of legend.

You stand among them.

Are you the hero whom the prophecy foretells?

--------------------------------------

■ Operating System
Android OS 4.0 or later
